description: This #8 Dissertation consists of a piece of independent research completed by the student under the supervision of a member of the Law School academic staff. Students are to complete a dissertation paper on a topic approved by the Director of Postgraduate Coursework Programs (Law). The final dissertation shall be no more than 25,000 words in length. This is a single semester course. Any approved topic for LAWS7701 must be substantially different from any other postgraduate research project/dissertation previously undertaken by the student.
prerequisites: GPA of 5.5 and permission from Head of School
